title: Sejuani Sucks
body: I have never played LOL with a more useless champ in my life. She has no attack power at all, isn't fast and doesn't seem to get better at any point. The ULT is useless and just defensive move.

replies.body: typical silver player. restrict flamers, leave this guy to play full ad shaco and ruin games. ITS OK!

well you saying she isn't good doesn't help anyone else, she is a top pick at LCS and she has quite the win rate. She is a great tank, who does fine damage for someone who is supposed to not build any AP/AD. Also, her ult is one of the best in the game, as game-changing as Malachite's.
still good times look up full ap sej mid on Brofresco starts slow but watch til end and shes just all over the map mopping people up
her main attack doesn't get any stronger?

sej is a main tank the only damage your going to get is ap she is not an AD champ doesnt attack fast at all but with ap she can 1 hit champs full ap builds she has heavy aoe damage and isnt a 1v1 champ

.....wait you were serious?

> [{quoted}](name=Lyless,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=j9qnBwhY,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-05T22:35:13.857+0000)
>
> I have never played LOL with a more useless champ in my life. She has no attack power at all, isn't fast and doesn't seem to get better at any point. The ULT is useless and just defensive move.

http://i.memeful.com/memes/R8em5Jd/Captain-Picard-Facepalm.jpg

First of all, she is currently one of the best tank **jungler**, in terms of excellent CC gank potential & the ability to soak up tons of damage. You are a real stupid Bronze person for wasting her CC potential as a top laner. She doesn't fare as good there as a Nautilus would. And second, she has one of the best team initiation of the game, using her ult to chain multiple enemies and rendering them helpless, and letting your team deal loads of free damage onto them. No one told you to stupidly go 1v5, expecting a Pentakill on one ult shot. She's a tank, not an assassin, and honestly, it seems like Sejuani isn't the right champ for you.

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=j9qnBwhY,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-05-06T04:26:20.335+0000)

You are a real stupid Bronze person for wasting her CC potential as a top laner. She doesn't fare as good there as a Nautilus would. And second, she has one of the best team initiation of the game, using her ult to chain multiple enemies and rendering them helpless, and letting your team deal loads of free damage onto them. No one told you to stupidly go 1v5, expecting a Pentakill on one ult shot. She's a tank, not an assassin, and honestly, it seems like Sejuani isn't the right champ for you.

And I have killed this "great champ dozens of time with noc. Easily!

Yes, because you're comparing the strengths between a TANK and an ASSASSIN. One is only an expert in dealing a shitton of CC, while the other deals tons of damage to a single target. Sejuani is a team-based champion, while Nocturne is based on killing off a single unawared target with his natural high base damage, so your point is highly invalid.

I seriously suggest you go do your research on every champion you learn, because the more and more you talk like this, is the one big fat reason why loads of people loves to discriminate Bronze people a lot.

Tell that to her 90% ban rate.
She's a tank not a melee ADC like nocturne is.  So her attack power isn't going to be high nor is she going to be fast, but her ult is waayyy better and it can be used to lock down an entire team.

> [{quoted}](name=Terff,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=j9qnBwhY,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-05-05T22:51:51.000+0000)
>
> She's a tank not a melee ADC like nocturne is.  So her attack power isn't going to be high nor is she going to be fast, but her ult is waayyy better and it can be used to lock down an entire team.

Noc is better in every way.

They have nothing to do with each other. Noc is a bruiser, Sejuani is a TANK, NOT a bruiser. You CAN'T compare them.  Noc is supposed to provide a bit of CC, a bit of damage, a bit of tankiness, he's a jack of all trades. Sejuani is a TANK, she is supposed to soak damage, and CC the enemy, all while trying to break through the tank front line of the enemy. I honestly don't know anyone who plays Sejuani ADC, as the fact that it SUCKS, so you should not compare Noc/any bruiser and Sejuani.

her ult has lots of damage and her w does lots of damage the more health she has she isnt supposed to have big damage but she has enough to exicute running champions. idk bout you but i can duel lots of people with sejuani and stay tanky
